text: The Angel Levine is a 1970 American drama movie directed by Ján Kadár and starring Zero Mostel, Harry Belafonte, Ida Kamińska, Milo O'Shea, Gloria Foster. It was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about angels Category:Movies directed by Ján Kadár
title: The Angel Levine
